data.name: Watchman Demo
data.detailed_description:
In the demo version of the game, you have to go through the first 2 nights!

STORY:

Due to financial problems, you get a job as a caretaker of an old abandoned Soviet-era freestyle wrestling gym, in which terrible events have taken place or have already taken place.
In order to figure out what is happening here, you will have to finish your night shifts, which last for 8 hours.
With each work shift, you will learn and delve into those events that will lead you to your personal understanding of what is happening.

GAMEPLAY:

  • Your main responsibilities include: sitting in your office and monitoring what is happening inside the gym. It is important to be aware of the fact that some strange freestyle wrestlers with incomprehensible bodily injuries, whose behavior is unpredictable, come to this gym.
  • With each shift, the wrestlers become more and more aggressive.
  • For your personal safety, you will have 2 armored doors that require a decent supply of energy, you also need to take into account the fact that each fighter needs its own approach to prevent the threat. It is also worth considering that even if you close yourself completely in your office, you will not be able to feel completely safe.

data.short_description: Demo version - Psychological horror in which you have to play as a watchman - an old, abandoned gym where after each completed shift you have to find out all the events that have taken place or have already taken place ...
data.supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Brazil, Polish, Portuguese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10, 64-bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-530
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM, NVIDIA Geforce GTX 260 / ATI Radeon HD 4870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains: nudity, sexual content, profanity, bloody bodies and screamers.
